body.section:
BUSMASTER Build Order:To Build BUSMASTER its dependency solution files must be compiled first.The following section describes the order of compilation.
Order:
Kernel\BusmasterKernel.sln
DBManager\DBManager.sln
BUSMASTER\BUSMASTER.sln
BUSMASTER\Language Dlls\Language Dlls.sln
BUSMASTER\LDFEditor\LDFEditor.sln
BUSMASTER\LDFViewer\LDFViewer.sln
BUSMASTER\Format Converter\FormatConverter.sln
